channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump vs. deep state: Tiny agency takes an oversized role in battle over aid

item.title: For A Party Of ‘Joy,’ Democrats Are Awfully Miserable
item.description: Democrats have let the joyless, leftist monster out of the closet, and there's no sign it wants to go back inside.

item.title: Trump’s Tariff War Endangers Trump’s Tax Cuts
item.description: The president has to make a choice.

item.title: Elon Musk and the Freedom Conservatives

item.title: Biggs seeks FBI probe into Democrat fundraising apparatus ActBlue
item.description: A House Republican lawmaker Thursday called on the FBI to begin an inquiry into the main fundraising apparatus of the Democratic Party.

item.title: PA Board Of Ed Decision Is Latest Move In National Effort To Diminish Christian Education
item.description: Democrats, who have long fought with teachers unions against making school choice more accessible, continue their assault on private education.

item.title: DOGE says 239 contracts canceled over 2 days, including a grant to teach trans farmers about 'food justice'
item.description: The federal government has saved millions of dollars after canceling 239 contracts, the Department of Government Efficiency said Thursday.

item.title: The Gal Gadot ‘Controversy’
item.description: The actress is a proud Israeli Jew, and she doesn’t care that some people have a problem with that.

item.title: House Republicans Move To Block Chinese Nationals From Obtaining U.S. Student Visas
item.description: 'We’ve literally invited the CCP to spy on our military, steal our intellectual property, and threaten national security,' Moore said.

item.title: Ukraine Never Turned Down a Survivable Deal
item.description: What we know about the negotiations suggests that there was never a deal on the table that would have left Ukraine secure from Russian conquest.

item.title: Southwest Can’t Gentle-Parent Loyal Customers Like Me Into Accepting Its Self-Destruction
item.description: For decades, SWA prided itself on being more than a business. Now, it’s choosing to die on the hill of sacrificing its customers for profit.

item.title: Democratic Rep. Raul Grijalva, 77, dies after battle with lung cancer
item.description: Longtime Democratic Rep. Raul Grijalva has died at 77 after a "long brave battle" with lung cancer, his office announced in a statement Thursday.
